FuncDef: The display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache resource command displays hardware flow table resource information for differentiated flow scheduling. The display mice-elephant-flow flow-cache resource command displays hardware flow table resource information for differentiated flow scheduling. This command is supported only on the CE6863H, CE6863H-K, CE6855-48XS8CQ, CE6885-SAN, CE8855, CE8851-32CQ4BQ, CE6881H, CE6881H-K, CE6820H, CE6820H-K, CE6820S, CE6885, CE6885-T, CE6885-LL (standard forwarding mode) and CE6863E-48S8CQ.

ParaDef.Info:
Specifies the slot ID.
The value is a string of 1 to 31 case-sensitive characters. It cannot contain spaces.
